column2: Daniel Craig is an English actor best known for playing British secret agent James Bond.
Daniel Craig starred in the Bond films Casino Royale in 2006, Quantum of Solace in 2008.
Daniel Craig earned a BAFTA award nomination for Casino Royale.
Daniel Craig will star in the Bond film Skyfall, opening November 9th, 2012 in the US.
James Bond star Daniel Craig will open the Olympic Games ceremony in true 007 style... with a daredevil leap into the Olympic Stadium from a helicopter.
Daniel Craig will drink Heineken beer instead of a Martini in the next James Bond film Skyfall.
In 2005, Craig was contracted by EON Productions to portray James Bond.
Craig is the first actor to portray James Bond to have been born after the Bond series already started, and Ian Fleming, the novels' writer, had died.
first actor Bond born after series started
first actor Bond born after Ian Fleming died
On 19 December 2011, it was announced that Daniel Craig has signed on for five future Bond films.
